subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4356 is on the way
description_text:
Listen to me, an please keep in mind, becoz next time I will not ask politley -> fuck your pick up generated label!!! I was asking for my paid goods, witch I will not riceve neather until new year, you fuckin chinese idiots!!!! ? So refoun my money if you did no have the capability to ship my order till' now!

I am sick of you allredy!

Multumesc and fuck off!!

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

conversations.body_text: Hi ane101,    We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused. Currently, our German warehouse is out of stock for the footrest, with restocking expected today. We will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fee you paid.

I was not ordering footrest, just pedals set and VAM haptic motors. Please not refound, just ship by DHL express asap!

-------- Original Message --------

Have you shiped my order?

https://proton.me/mail/home

-------- Original Message --------

Hi ane101,    Your order was originally scheduled to ship from our German warehouse, but due to shipping delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They will now ship next Monday. We will issue a $30 refund as compensation. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused!

Hello,

I really hope today you will shipp my order using SUPER express DHL, so i can receve it these year, or alse i would like full refound, instantly!

Thank you!

-------- Original Message --------
Hi ane101,    We will ship your order today, but we cannot guarantee delivery before Christmas.

Hello,

Have you shiped my order, i would like the traking number or refound, today?

Thank you

https://proton.me/mail/home

-------- Original Message --------
Hi ane101,    Your order has been shipped, and we have updated your shipping notification.  https://www.dhl.com/us-en/home/tracking.html?tracking-id=CE326636628DE

??????? plenty of!!! You guys just got on my nervest!

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.
